review: Wonderful little gadget. Google has done a great job integrating Android with it. There are still quite a few issues with losing connection on various apps, which makes pausing playback sometimes quite a chore. It's been slowly getting better, but I'm still giving it a 5 star rating, as the interface is easier to use and understand than any other streaming device I've used.
